name: market for transport, passenger, electric scooter | transport, passenger, electric scooter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4664/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'transport, passenger, electric scooter', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of transportation of one passenger across one kilometre (km). This service only considers the transportation of passengers. The vehicle has a weight of 122.1 kg which includes 32 kg the mass of the for the battery. Lifetime of the vehicle is considered 50000 km and lifetime of the battery 25000 km. 

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
